document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R18-032
Authorization of Council Attorney Contract Act of 2019
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 19th day of December, 2018, the following Resolution was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo') is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America; and
the sovereign authority of the Pueblo is vested in its Council, Governor, Courts, and the People; and
the Council is authorized to make laws and appropriate funds for the Pueblo; and
the Council has identified the need for legal counsel to assist with the development of laws for the Pueblo and the operations of the Council; and

the Council has utilized the services of experienced lawyers from the law firm of Robert J. Lyttle, PC, Attorneys at law ("Attorneys") for at least seven (7) years to provide legal advice and assistance in a cost-effective manner, and the Council wishes to continue these services.
that the Council hereby approves the continuation of the Attorneys' legal representation of the Council including the authorization and approval of a sole-source contract with the Attorneys.

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on December 19 , 2018, at a meeting with a vote of in favor, opposed, abstaining and absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

Resolution No. SI-R18-032 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 19th day of December, 2018, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4(c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.

section.heading: Authorization of Council Attorney Contract Act of 2019
section.text: This enactment shall be known as "AUTHORIZATION OF COUNCIL ATTORNEY CONTRACT ACT OF 2019" ("Act").

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Council hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: The Council has identified the need for legal counsel services to assist with the development of laws for the Pueblo and to provide advice on the operations of the Council; and

The Council has utilized the services of experienced lawyers from the law firm of Robert J. Lyttle, PC, Attorneys at Law ("Attorneys") for at least seven (7) years to provide legal advice and assistance in a cost-effective manner, and the Council wishes to continue these services.

section.heading: Authorization of Contract
section.text: The Council hereby approves the continuation of the Attorneys' legal representation of the Council including the authorization and approval of a sole-source contract with the Attorneys (Exhibit A).
